value:
$nMPID_双界カアラ|Lady Freyja is no warrior. And yet,
her presence is as sharp as any blade.
How mysterious...

$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|The same dream can bring either
comfort or pain, depending on the
dreamer and their circumstances.$k$pSo...which will this festival inspire?

$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|Ever ready to fight, Karla walks her
path with dignity. A rare mortal, to be
certain.

$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|I cannot forgive the mortals that took
my brother from me.$k$pHowever...I will not hold it against the
children enjoying this festival.

$nMPID_双界カアラ|The explosive power of a rabbit is
nothing short of impressive. That said,
I'm still not sure about this outfit...

We are messengers of the spring
festival. This time, we have a gift from
your friend $Nf.

$nMPID_双界カアラ|Lady Freyja, I will open our path.
Let's leave this festival behind us.

$nMPID_双界カアラ|However I am asked to perform,
I will not falter.
$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|All just a trick of spring...

$nMPID_双界カアラ|I-I'm so happity hoppity!
...These spring pleasantries are
difficult to get used to.

Karla, stand proud. You face the
spring festival with the queen of
Dökkálfheimr at your side.

$nMPID_双界カアラ|Is this place...really a dream? If it is,
I would prefer to wake up before my
brother can see me like this.$k$p$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|To think you mortals would feel
shame even in a dream... You truly
are beyond my understanding.$k$p$nMPID_双界カアラ|Huh? W-well, isn't that only natural?
If I'm wrong, and this isn't a dream,
others will remember this odd attire.$k$p$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|Why worry yourself over others?
Dreams are your soul and its
deepest desires made manifest.$k$pThis form you are in now is, without
question, based upon your own
feelings.$k$p$nMPID_双界カアラ|I find it hard to believe that I would
ever desire this, no matter how
deep it may be buried...$k$pStill, I suppose feeling embarrassed
about it is proof that, even in a
dream, I am still myself.$k$p$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|Indeed. Perhaps now you can begin
to realize that there is no true
difference between dream and reality.$k$pAfter all, even the loveliest dream
eventually ends.
$nMPID_二人|Spring is here!
$nMPID_二人|Tidings...of warmth!
$nMPID_双界カアラ|Blink even once...
$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|No dreams today.
Just resting my eyes...
You must focus.
Failure will not be tolerated.
"We are" "Rabbits!"
"Behold!" "Spring has arrived!"
"Lady Freyja." "Yes."
What is it?
Hippity hop…
We will abide.
$nMPID_双界カアラ|Hm? Is that—no, never mind...

$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|Karla, what are you so flustered over?
It is undignified.

$nMPID_双界カアラ|My apologies. I thought I saw my
brother in the crowd. But of course,
it was someone else.

$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|Oh? Would it be strange for him to
attend a festival such as this?

$nMPID_双界カアラ|Not strange, exactly. In truth, it is
that I hope we don't meet like this.
Not now.

We were never on the greatest of
terms, and it's been years since we
last saw each other.
$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|I see. I know of what you speak.

$nMPID_双界カアラ|Lady Freyja, did something also
happen between you and your
brother?

$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|Yes. Though my experience is not
one you could comprehend.

Because no matter if decades or even
centuries pass...the distance between
us can grow no smaller.

$nMPID_双界カアラ|I see... You may be right. Centuries
are far too long for most people to
ever truly fathom.

$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|Still, I can say this much: to my eyes,
the lifespan of a mortal is like the
fleeting dream of a single evening.

If it is something that can be done
before that dream fades away, you
should strive to accomplish it.
$nMPID_双界カアラ|Yes. I thank you for that.

I will not give up. Someday, I will
find Karel and tell him what I've
learned from my own journey.

$nMPID_フレイヤ味方|Good. Now then...if you think he
might be here, let us find him.
$nMPID_双界カアラ|Find him? Now? Dressed like this? I...
